judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The decree of the Orphans’ Court is affirmed on the Opinion of Judge Lansberry, which is reported in 8 D. & C. 2d 247. Each party shall pay his or their respective costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Charles II. Co froth, for appellant.
Frank A. Orban, Jr., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Hammer Estate.
May 27, 1957:
Argued March 27, 1957.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
Charles II. Co froth, for appellant.
Frank A. Orban, Jr., for appellee.
